about_the_game:
▽Synopsis: This is a visual novel game featuring toxic wave of electricity with a gameplay duration of 5-10 minutes. You will spend some bedtime moments with your “best friend” that can be either enjoyable or less pleasant. Will you take the medicine?

▽Warning: This game contains psychological horror, meta-game elements, and distressing episodes of mental disorder, which may cause intense discomfort.

▽Disclaimer: Claiming that “this game is based on real events” may easily lead others to identify specific individuals through their experiences. Therefore, please consider this game solely as a combination of abstract concepts and a textual gaming experience.

The author is a student developer and a fan of "どくでんぱ" games.This game pays homage to a game "Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk" that the author holds in high regard and really loves.You can see more information about me in the txt document in the game folder.

name: Procambarus fallax

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
